GeneDef.label: fleshmass nucleus
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that form inside the fleshmass nucleus. It gives incredibly fast regeneration and causes constant mutations. However, the death of the carrier can cause the appearance of a fleshmass heart.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Death of the gene carrier spawns a <color=#b0bf80>fleshmass heart</color>.
Mutations obtained in this way differ from the standard ones.
If the mutation fails, one of the <color=#b0bf80>mutations progresses</color> and becomes stronger.
